title: Record Audio Coming out of your PC (Without Stereo Mix)
tags: Solve no stereo mix recording problem
How to record Windows audio on your PC or laptop -
How to record your computer's sound output
How to record streaming audio like spotify
How to Record the Sound Coming From Your PC
description: Most modern computers don't have Stereo Mix option in sound settings, but you can still record system audio.   This video shows 2 ways, you can record an audio coming out of your Windows computer.   One, you can use audacity with Windows WASAPI settings or two, connect the microphone and headset with a male to male audio cable.
